text: Niscaya yisakale nijara oparata an'yaya karae sihamtara praanagrahanara samayata phiraistasakale kaya, ‘tomaloke ki arasthata achila’? Sihamte kaya, ‘prthiraita ami nihsahaya achilo’, sihamte kaya, ‘allahara prthirai imana prasasta nachilane ye tomaloke ana tha'ilai hijarata karai yaba noraaraila’? Ihamtarae'i abasasthala jahannama, arau e'ito kimana ye nikrsta abasa
